ingredients.content: 1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place onions, apples, garlic and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Sauté <b>10 min/100°C/speed <b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add curry powder and flour then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add stock, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/98°C/speed 0.5<b>. Blend <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Serve warm over chips.
